lead_paragraph: It's a pretty awesome image : Michael Phelps, posing with a crowd of smiling barbers and customers after getting a haircut on his way to the Olympics.

headline.main: Michael Phelps Takes Selfie at Atlanta Barbershop
headline.print_headline: Michael Phelps Takes Selfie at Atlanta Barbershop
